meanings.definition: Spread or smear (a substance) over a surface.
meanings.sent1: She shmears butter on her toast every morning.
meanings.sent2: He always shmears sunscreen on his skin before going to the beach.
meanings.sent3: The toddler accidentally shmears jelly all over the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent4: The artist carefully shmears paint on the canvas to create a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The chef expertly shmears sauce on the pizza, ensuring even distribution.

meanings.sent3: The cat licked the shmears of cream cheese left on the plate.
meanings.sent4: The child's face was covered in shmears of chocolate after eating a brownie.
meanings.sent5: The picnic basket was filled with sandwiches with flavorful shmears inside.
